en.title: Feet & Inches Calculator
en.seoTitle: Feet & Inches Calculator - Convert and Calculate Length Measurements
en.metaDescription: Free feet and inches calculator. Add, subtract, multiply, and divide feet and inches measurements. Perfect for construction, carpentry, and DIY projects.
en.summary: Add, subtract, multiply, and divide feet and inches measurements with our specialized calculator.
en.description: Our feet and inches calculator makes working with imperial measurements easy. Perfect for construction workers, carpenters, and DIY enthusiasts. Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division operations with feet and inches while automatically handling conversions.
instructions: Enter measurements in feet and inches format
Choose your operation (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
Get results automatically converted to proper feet and inches format
